name: Death from a Thousand Cuts: (Fighter 16/ Bard 4/ Red Dragon Disciple 10)
author: Valerfor

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Coming from the far lands of Kara-Tur and bolstered by a Dragon's might, this sword-maiden will spin around and cut you from a thousand angles, never giving you pause.
 
Death from a Thousand Cuts 
(FTR 16/ BARD 4/ RDD 10)
  


RACE: Elf

ALIGNMENT: CN (Smite proof) [Any Non-Lawful]

PLAYABILITY: PvM 1-40

INT –   14 (16)
WIS –  08

BAB: 22 (Four attacks → Six while Dual-Wielding)

Fire Immunity, Paralysis Immunity, Immunity to Sleep, Darkvision
